title: Musk’s brain implant company reportedly investigated over animal deaths
description: Neuralink, which is developing a brain implant to treat neurological conditions, reportedly has killed 1,500 animals involved in tests since 2018.

title: Finding myths and meaning in the lo-fi world of ‘Dwarf Fortress’
description: After 20 years of development, the 1.0 version of "Dwarf Fortress" is out. The game provides players with endless stories — if they can master its menus.

title: The voices left out of Elon Musk’s free-speech agenda
description: Elon Musk has said little about what Twitter should do to give people a voice when their own governments do not want people to have it. Look at China and Iran.

title: What is ChatGPT, the viral social media AI?
description: ChatGPT is a conversational AI project from OpenAI that's been generating funny and sometimes insightful answers to questions.
